name: Head Goal: Soccer Online
description: Unbelievably fast soccer and volleyball game. Challenge your friends and prove who is the best.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP or Newer Processor: 2.0 GHz Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX 9.0c and Shader Model 3.0 support (almost all graphics cards) DirectX: Version 9.0c Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 200 MB available space
